11#ifndef VPX_VP9_ENCODER_VP9_RD_H_
12#define VPX_VP9_ENCODER_VP9_RD_H_
13
14#include <limits.h>
15
16#include "vp9/common/vp9_blockd.h"
17
18#include "vp9/encoder/vp9_block.h"
19#include "vp9/encoder/vp9_context_tree.h"
20#include "vp9/encoder/vp9_cost.h"
21
22#ifdef __cplusplus
23extern "C" {
24#endif
25
26#define RDDIV_BITS 7
27#define RD_EPB_SHIFT 6
28
29#define RDCOST(RM, DM, R, D) \
30 ROUND_POWER_OF_TWO(((int64_t)(R)) * (RM), VP9_PROB_COST_SHIFT) + ((D) << (DM))
31#define RDCOST_NEG_R(RM, DM, R, D) \
32 ((D) << (DM)) - ROUND_POWER_OF_TWO(((int64_t)(R)) * (RM), VP9_PROB_COST_SHIFT)
33#define RDCOST_NEG_D(RM, DM, R, D) \
34 ROUND_POWER_OF_TWO(((int64_t)(R)) * (RM), VP9_PROB_COST_SHIFT) - ((D) << (DM))
35
36#define QIDX_SKIP_THRESH 115
37
38#define MV_COST_WEIGHT 108
39#define MV_COST_WEIGHT_SUB 120
40
41#define MAX_MODES 30
42#define MAX_REFS 6
43
44#define RD_THRESH_INIT_FACT 32
45#define RD_THRESH_MAX_FACT 64
46#define RD_THRESH_INC 1
47
48#define VP9_DIST_SCALE_LOG2 4
49#define VP9_DIST_SCALE (1 << VP9_DIST_SCALE_LOG2)
50
51// This enumerator type needs to be kept aligned with the mode order in
52// const MODE_DEFINITION vp9_mode_order[MAX_MODES] used in the rd code.
53typedef enum {
54 THR_NEARESTMV,
55 THR_NEARESTA,
56 THR_NEARESTG,
57
58 THR_DC,
59
60 THR_NEWMV,
61 THR_NEWA,
62 THR_NEWG,
63
64 THR_NEARMV,
65 THR_NEARA,
66 THR_NEARG,
67
68 THR_ZEROMV,
69 THR_ZEROG,
70 THR_ZEROA,
71
72 THR_COMP_NEARESTLA,
73 THR_COMP_NEARESTGA,
74
75 THR_TM,
76
77 THR_COMP_NEARLA,
78 THR_COMP_NEWLA,
79 THR_COMP_NEARGA,
80 THR_COMP_NEWGA,
81
82 THR_COMP_ZEROLA,
83 THR_COMP_ZEROGA,
84
85 THR_H_PRED,
86 THR_V_PRED,
87 THR_D135_PRED,
88 THR_D207_PRED,
89 THR_D153_PRED,
90 THR_D63_PRED,
91 THR_D117_PRED,
92 THR_D45_PRED,
93} THR_MODES;
94
95typedef enum {
96 THR_LAST,
97 THR_GOLD,
98 THR_ALTR,
99 THR_COMP_LA,
100 THR_COMP_GA,
101 THR_INTRA,
102} THR_MODES_SUB8X8;
103
104typedef struct RD_OPT {
105 // Thresh_mult is used to set a threshold for the rd score. A higher value
106 // means that we will accept the best mode so far more often. This number
107 // is used in combination with the current block size, and thresh_freq_fact to
108 // pick a threshold.
109 int thresh_mult[MAX_MODES];
110 int thresh_mult_sub8x8[MAX_REFS];
111
112 int threshes[MAX_SEGMENTS][BLOCK_SIZES][MAX_MODES];
113
114 int64_t prediction_type_threshes[MAX_REF_FRAMES][REFERENCE_MODES];
115
116 int64_t filter_threshes[MAX_REF_FRAMES][SWITCHABLE_FILTER_CONTEXTS];
117#if CONFIG_CONSISTENT_RECODE || CONFIG_RATE_CTRL
118 int64_t prediction_type_threshes_prev[MAX_REF_FRAMES][REFERENCE_MODES];
119
120 int64_t filter_threshes_prev[MAX_REF_FRAMES][SWITCHABLE_FILTER_CONTEXTS];
121#endif // CONFIG_CONSISTENT_RECODE || CONFIG_RATE_CTRL
122 int RDMULT;
123 int RDDIV;
124 double r0;
125} RD_OPT;
126
127typedef struct RD_COST {
128 int rate;
129 int64_t dist;
130 int64_t rdcost;
131} RD_COST;
132
133// Reset the rate distortion cost values to maximum (invalid) value.
134void vp9_rd_cost_reset(RD_COST *rd_cost);
135// Initialize the rate distortion cost values to zero.
136void vp9_rd_cost_init(RD_COST *rd_cost);
137// It supports negative rate and dist, which is different from RDCOST().
138int64_t vp9_calculate_rd_cost(int mult, int div, int rate, int64_t dist);
139// Update the cost value based on its rate and distortion.
140void vp9_rd_cost_update(int mult, int div, RD_COST *rd_cost);
141
142struct TileInfo;
143struct TileDataEnc;
144struct VP9_COMP;
145struct macroblock;
146
147int vp9_compute_rd_mult_based_on_qindex(const struct VP9_COMP *cpi, int qindex);
148
149int vp9_compute_rd_mult(const struct VP9_COMP *cpi, int qindex);
150
151int vp9_get_adaptive_rdmult(const struct VP9_COMP *cpi, double beta);

153void vp9_initialize_rd_consts(struct VP9_COMP *cpi);
154
155void vp9_initialize_me_consts(struct VP9_COMP *cpi, MACROBLOCK *x, int qindex);
156
157void vp9_model_rd_from_var_lapndz(unsigned int var, unsigned int n_log2,
158 unsigned int qstep, int *rate, int64_t *dist);
159
160void vp9_model_rd_from_var_lapndz_vec(unsigned int var[MAX_MB_PLANE],
161 unsigned int n_log2[MAX_MB_PLANE],
162 unsigned int qstep[MAX_MB_PLANE],
163 int64_t *rate_sum, int64_t *dist_sum);
164
165int vp9_get_switchable_rate(const struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
166 const MACROBLOCKD *const xd);
167
168int vp9_raster_block_offset(BLOCK_SIZE plane_bsize, int raster_block,
169 int stride);
170
171int16_t *vp9_raster_block_offset_int16(BLOCK_SIZE plane_bsize, int raster_block,
172 int16_t *base);
173
174YV12_BUFFER_CONFIG *vp9_get_scaled_ref_frame(const struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
175 int ref_frame);
176
177void vp9_init_me_luts(void);
178
179void vp9_get_entropy_contexts(BLOCK_SIZE bsize, TX_SIZE tx_size,
180 const struct macroblockd_plane *pd,
181 ENTROPY_CONTEXT t_above[16],
182 ENTROPY_CONTEXT t_left[16]);
183
184void vp9_set_rd_speed_thresholds(struct VP9_COMP *cpi);
185
186void vp9_set_rd_speed_thresholds_sub8x8(struct VP9_COMP *cpi);
187
188void vp9_update_rd_thresh_fact(int (*factor_buf)[MAX_MODES], int rd_thresh,
189 int bsize, int best_mode_index);
190
191static INLINE int rd_less_than_thresh(int64_t best_rd, int thresh,
192 const int *const thresh_fact) {
193 return best_rd < ((int64_t)thresh * (*thresh_fact) >> 5) || thresh == INT_MAX;
194}
195
196static INLINE void set_error_per_bit(MACROBLOCK *x, int rdmult) {
197 x->errorperbit = rdmult >> RD_EPB_SHIFT;
198 x->errorperbit += (x->errorperbit == 0);
199}
200
201void vp9_mv_pred(struct VP9_COMP *cpi, MACROBLOCK *x, uint8_t *ref_y_buffer,
202 int ref_y_stride, int ref_frame, BLOCK_SIZE block_size);
203
204void vp9_setup_pred_block(const MACROBLOCKD *xd,
205 struct buf_2d dst[MAX_MB_PLANE],
206 const YV12_BUFFER_CONFIG *src, int mi_row, int mi_col,
207 const struct scale_factors *scale,
208 const struct scale_factors *scale_uv);
209
210int vp9_get_intra_cost_penalty(const struct VP9_COMP *const cpi,
211 BLOCK_SIZE bsize, int qindex, int qdelta);
212
213unsigned int vp9_get_sby_variance(struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
214 const struct buf_2d *ref, BLOCK_SIZE bs);
215unsigned int vp9_get_sby_perpixel_variance(struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
216 const struct buf_2d *ref,
217 BLOCK_SIZE bs);
218#if CONFIG_VP9_HIGHBITDEPTH
219unsigned int vp9_high_get_sby_variance(struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
220 const struct buf_2d *ref, BLOCK_SIZE bs,
221 int bd);
222unsigned int vp9_high_get_sby_perpixel_variance(struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
223 const struct buf_2d *ref,
224 BLOCK_SIZE bs, int bd);
225#endif

227void vp9_build_inter_mode_cost(struct VP9_COMP *cpi);
